Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Locate the bathroom sink.', '2. Fill the sink with water.', '3. Add soap to the water to create
 soapy water.']

behavior locate_bathroom_sink(bathroom:item):
    body:
        achieve inside_char(char, bathroom) 
        # Move the character inside the bathroom

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        # Select a bathroom within the context
        locate_bathroom_sink(bathroom)
        # Execute the behavior to locate the bathroom sink

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Fill the bathroom sink with water.', '2. Add soap to the water and mix until it is soapy.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink in the bathroom

        achieve has_water(sink)
        # Fill the selected sink with water

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Locate the bathroom sink.', '2. Fill the sink with water.', '3. Add soap to the water in the si
nk.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        # Bind the bathroom as a location to search for the sink
        
        foreach sink: item:
            if is_sink(sink) and inside(sink, bathroom) and not visited(sink):
                observe(sink, "Locate the bathroom sink")
                # Observe each sink in the bathroom to ensure it is correctly identified

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Fill the bathroom sink with water.', '2. Add soap to the water.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink
        
        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
        # Select a faucet that is close to the sink

        achieve plugged(sink)
        # Ensure the sink is plugged

        achieve_once is_on(faucet)
        # Turn on the faucet to fill the sink

        observe(sink, "check if the sink is filled with water")
        # Check if the sink has been filled with water

        achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        # Turn off the faucet after the sink is filled
